title: Misunderstanding of NameDrop Feature by Local Police Departments

content.background: Local police departments are warning parents about a new iPhone feature called NameDrop, which allows for easier sharing of contact info. However, these warnings are based on a misunderstanding of how the feature actually works.
content.summary: Police departments have been sharing warnings on social media about the NameDrop feature, claiming that it can easily collect children's contact information. However, this is not accurate as the feature requires deliberate action from users to share their contact info, and it only works when devices are held very close together for a few seconds. These warnings seem to have been sparked by a misrepresentation of the feature in a TikTok video. Apple needs to improve its communication of new features in software updates to ensure users understand them.

title: Wi-Fi Issue after Installing NVIDIA Driver

content.background: Installing NVIDIA drivers on Ubuntu 22.04 and experiencing Wi-Fi issues.
content.summary: Several individuals have reported Wi-Fi connectivity problems after installing NVIDIA drivers on Ubuntu 22.04. The issue is identified through the 'lshw -C Network' command, which shows an unclaimed network controller. Troubleshooting steps from Stack Exchange have been attempted, but the problem persists.
